suppress.notes: Plenty of snakeyaml and clj-yaml false positives. All YAML is under our control, so we don't care.
We're not vulnerable because we don't use FTP.
We're not vulnerable because we don't use FileUpload -- this is a standard dependency of ring / compojure but disabled by default.
This CVE is a false positive according to the Jackson project maintainers. See https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-databind/issues/3972
False positive; does not apply to logback-json-core but json-c
False positive; does not apply to logback-json-core but json-c
False positive; does not apply to logback-json-core but json-c
